summary:
EXPERTISE: 
I support organisations for social impact through strategic consulting, training and lecturing:
* CIVIL SOCIETY ENGAGEMENt IN HUMAN RIGHTS AND RULE OF LAW: evaluation, proposal writing & assessment, training & facilitation
* EAST OF THE EU: Southern Caucasus, Ukraine, Moldova, Belarus, Central Asia, Western Balkans, and who knows some time in an unknown future Russia
* DECOLONISING international cooperation and SHIFTING THE POWER towards Southern leadership and ownership: facilitation, advice and peer learning
* DIVERSITY, EQUITY AND INCLUSION: minorities & vulnerable grops, women & girls, social inclusion and intersectionality, intercultural management, anchoring in The Hague
* BRIDGING THE LANGUAGE GAP: translation from English, Dutch & Russian into French; proofreading and editing texts in French; policy documents, academic articles, reports, and more
Discover my services on https//:manondecourten.com.

PERSONAL EXPLORATIONS:
I explore landscapes, their meanings and transformations under the climate emergency:
* Skide: cross-country skiing on sand for an alternative experiencing of the North Sea shores
* Ritlu, an artistic project to address cultural gaps with Russia and perceptions of the climate crisis across the Arctic region

PERSONALITY:
My mission is to be an eye-opener and a connecting agent between people from various backgrounds and countries. 

I am a culturally aware and open-minded professional, a creative thinker and an enthusiastic team player.

With a background in philosophy and management experience in international cooperation, I am both idealistic and result-oriented. 

With 20+ years of experience of cooperating with the New East - previously called the post-Soviet space -, I am fluent in Russian and able to situate issues in their broader context.

My passion for advising, training and presenting makes me an inspiring and dedicated communicator. 

I work together with profit and non-for-profit, governmental and non-governmental organisations at international, national, and local level.

I believe in authenticity, integrity, and in the transformative power of empathy and humor.

français, néerlandais, anglais, russe", 'title': 'Translator, Editor, Language Trainer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Manon de Courten', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Manon de Courten', 'description': "How does it feel to live at the sandy north sea shore when you come from a country of rocks and hills? The confinement due to the pandemic has offered time to explore my relationship to the dune landscape in The Hague: http://manondecourten.com/blog-a-sense-of-sand.html

In 2019, I set up the Ritlu project in partnership with artist and researcher Christina Stadlbauer. 
Ritlu is an artistic project proposing explorations around the dramatic transformation of the Arctic region due to the rapid and irreversible melting of the Ocean and overall change of climatic conditions, as point of departure. 'Ritlu' is inspired by the Chukchi term for 'Gift from the Sea'. About our project, read my blog Arctic youth and the climate crisis. 

In 2013-2016, I worked at developing a new sustainable product allowing to cross-country ski on the North sea beach sand. This playful response to climate change and innovative way to experience the North Sea shores was nominated for The Hague Innovators' Challenge contest 2016, 2nd round (www.impactcity.nl/innovator/skide).
For the research, I successfully completed the Summer School Entrepreneurship & Innovation organized by Venture Lab at University Twente (July 2013, Enschede), participated in the New Venture contest on innovation and sustainability (October 2013-January 2014)(www.newventure.nl), and joined the Information day Europese Instrumenten voor eco-innovatief mkb in Horizon 2020, organized by RVO in Amersfoort (19 May 2014, Amersfoort).", 'title': 'Landscape Explorer and Connecting Agent', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 228382, 'name': 'MDF Training & Consultancy', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEU3FpFrNEtLw/company-logo_400_400/0/1657197890850?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=rCkc2f6IBWmW7f6joORX7aGhUxjig2nFpTbtgBohzw4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mdf-training-&-consultancy/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Ede, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'MDF | Empowering People, Creating Impact', 'description': '- Consultancy: advice to organisations on evaluation, strategising and implementation
